GET IN TOUCH

Year

2017

Location

Manchester,UK

Tags

UX Strategy, IoT, Storyboarding

Football Club

A Football Club in the UK wanted to develop an application to teach football skills to kids. An application that would enable kids to learn the style of play that is consistent with the clubâ€™s philosophy.

Problem

The objectives cover user engagement, new fan acquisition, skills development, brand engagement, app downloads and progression throughout the lifecycle of the application.

Process

Working with Coaches, Parents, Kids of the target age group and child development experts to come up with the ideas for the application and protoyping the application.

Training Challenges

Several rounds of consultation, design and user testing to fabricate the experience of training challenges that could be taken by the kids.

Setting the field

Augmented reality tech to set up the field for training & taking up the challenges.

Thoughtful Integrations

Integrations with other devices & wearables to bring about all round development of skills.

Addictive Experiences

Experiences that motivate the kids to keep using the application and challenge themselves to success.
